alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:36PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Phelps and southwestern Buffalo Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 336 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Odessa, or 9 miles west of Kearney, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kearney, Amherst and Riverdale. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 259 and 272. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
